snippet: Celebrating Joan of Arc, the cross-dressing, teenage virgin-warrior-martyr-saint, on her 600th birthday.
abstract: Celebrating Joan of Arc, the cross-dressing, teenage virgin-warrior-martyr-saint, on her 600th birthday.
lead_paragraph: Today is the 600th anniversary of the birth of Joan of Arc, the cross-dressing, teenage virgin-warrior-martyr-saint. So what better way for President Nicolas Sarkozy - three months away from an election and mired in Europe's economic crisis - to feel good about France than to make a pilgrimage to her birthplace?
